title: Romania: Aegon Prestige - The New Insurance and Capital Growth Tool for Citibank Clients
summary: Bucharest, Romania - Citibank Romania customers can now benefit from Aegon Prestige, a new financial product developed by Aegon, which combines the characteristics of life insurance products with the open architecture of investment funds.
tag-1: Romania: Aegon Prestige - The New Insurance and Capital Growth Tool for Citibank Clients
tag-2: Bucharest, Romania – Citibank Romania customers can now benefit from Aegon Prestige, a new financial product developed by Aegon, which combines the characteristics of life insurance products with the open architecture of investment funds.
tag-3: Aegon Prestige is a life insurance product with a single premium, which places 100 percent of the premium in selected investment funds. With a one-off payment of minimum EUR 5000 or US$7000, clients can have access to investment funds that are managed by top global fund houses. As a result, clients can diversify their portfolio across different markets, sectors and currencies by selecting from the 28 mutual funds currently available through Citibank in its capacity as insurance intermediary.
tag-4: Aegon Prestige is one of the most flexible products on the market. It provides a minimum of 12 free transfers between funds per year, offering customers the possibility to adjust their investment strategy depending on the duration of the investment, risk appetite and expected results.
tag-5: The product has an attractive taxation structure as there are no fees for entering the investment programs, allowing clients the flexibility to adapt their investment strategy with minimum financial impact.
tag-6: "With Aegon Prestige, our customers are now able to make the most out of a life insurance product by combining the protection component with the possibility to obtain higher returns given by access to investment programs," said Mihaela Nacu, Sales and Distribution Head at Citibank Romania. "What is truly remarkable about this product is that it offers extended control to the customer – from the ability to choose his or her own investment strategy and to switch between funds to the ability to make partial or full withdrawals anytime during the contract. All the components make this product adaptable to each customer's individual needs and objectives."
tag-7: "It is in Aegon's DNA to provide customized solutions for its bancassurance partners. When developing this product together with the Citibank team, we first looked at their clients' needs and expectations and, of course, at the global financial and investment trends. This resulted in a unique and modern product, Aegon Prestige, that enables access to an exclusive mix of investment funds from prestigious houses such as BlackRock, Schroder, JP Morgan, Templeton, Credit Suisse, Allianz and Fidelity," stated Sînziana Maioreanu, CEO of Aegon Romania.
tag-8: Customers have 24/7 access to their Aegon Prestige account through a web-based platform, Your Aegon, which enables them to check their account balance, perform transfers and review past transactions.
